titles.title: Mount Rushmore Improvements Act of 1987
A bill to provide for improvements to the Mount Rushmore Memorial.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

bill.summary: 2/26/1987--Introduced. Mount Rushmore Improvements Act of 1987 - Directs the National Park Service to develop by the end of FY 1987 a comprehensive design and plan for upgrading and expanding the facilities at Mount Rushmore National Memorial, South Dakota. Authorizes appropriations.
